name: Low Effort Invader
description:
Made in 5 hours for Low Effort Jam 2020

It is inspired by Chicken Invaders and Space Invaders (Obviously).

(and a little by Elite and Tyrian)

Enemies are getting +1 hit point in every wave and they are slowly moving down.

There are 3 kinds of power ups:

  • +1 Life
  • Weapon upgrade
  • insta kill all enemies

The game ends if you die and restarts after 10 seconds, it may be very unbalanced, the testing (and the whole game) was done with relatively Low Effort just for fun and to relax.

You can move left or right with the arrows or A or D or with the mouse and shoot with shift or ctrl or space or mouse click.

Escape toggles the cursor, but you may have to press it twice because of how the focusing works in the browser.

The whole process (except coming up with the basic idea) was recorded but sadly somehow there is no audio :(
